H0.text: Quartz is probably contained in the small rock that the student picked up using a magnet.

H1.text: Diamond is probably contained in the small rock that a student picked up using a magnet.

H2.text: Aluminum is probably the material contained in the small rock that the student picked up using a magnet.

H3.text: Iron is probably contained in the small rock that the student picked up using a magnet.

A4.text: Ferromagnetic materials, such as iron, are noticeably attracted to a magnet.

A5.text: The common ferromagnetic materials include iron, cobalt, nickel, and their alloys.
